alert.note: Alert for Pima; Santa Cruz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 23 at 9:02PM MST until August 23 at 11:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of South Central Arizona and Southeast Arizona, including the following counties, in South Central Arizona, Pima. In Southeast Arizona, Cochise and Santa Cruz. * WHEN...Until midnight MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 859 PM MST, Showers and thunderstorms with heavy rain will continue to track south through southern Cochise, Santa Cruz and south central Pima county late this evening. Expect rainfall runoff to drain into normally dry washes resulting in running water. Roadway dips and other low-lying areas will experience significant ponding of water. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Sierra Vista, Sahuarita, Green Valley, Nogales, Douglas, Bisbee, Benson, Tubac, Rio Rico, Hereford, Whetstone, Huachuca City, East Sahuarita, Tombstone, Naco, Patagonia, Sonoita, Elgin, Fort Huachuca and Kartchner Caverns State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
